reviewText: I watched the on Amazon Prime Acorn subscription.  Very amusing, but also a serious element to the series.  This is "coming of age in the early 1970s" story.  There are very funny moments, but also takes a serious look at relationships.  Some of the British speech might be difficult for Americans, but your ears soon adjust, besides there is always CC.  Recommend.  I hope there will be a season 2, but even if there isn't, it ended in a fulfilling way.
